release.notes:
© 1987 International Record Syndicate, Inc.
℗ 1987 I.R.S., Inc

[l285745] - hand-etched "Emw" or "ℰMW". 'ƐMW' was etched in the deadwax,or 'B' code on the label next to the A&M logo or underneath the ℗ A&M Records, Inc.

This version has solid green cover.
Record appears black, but when held up to light it is dark brown translucent.
Printed inner sleeve with liner notes and credits.

Spline is labeled 'DEAD LETTER OFFICE | B-SIDES COMPILED'.
Labels read  'DEAD LETTER OFFICE'.
